name: Astray (itch) (sehuang7)
description:
Created By: Diego Najera and Serena Huang

Astray is a relaxing 2D platformer game where you will be able to play as a small slime and follow its journey through multiple levels. In this game you will be able to collect coins along the way and also try out different power ups that provide unique functionality.

All artwork and music was sourced from the Unity Asset Store and itch.io.
